class ModelResponse:
    output: list[TResponseOutputItem]
    """A list of outputs (messages, tool calls, etc) generated by the model"""

    usage: Usage
    """The usage information for the response."""

    response_id: str | None

- ModelResponse may humay ye 3 cheezain milti hain aur "output" property mein response milta hai kay aage kya krna hai
- Phir har naya ModelResponse append hota rehta hai

ResponseOutputItem: TypeAlias = Annotated[
    Union[
        ResponseOutputMessage,
        ResponseFileSearchToolCall,
        ResponseFunctionToolCall,
        ResponseFunctionWebSearch,
        ResponseComputerToolCall,
        ResponseReasoningItem,
        ImageGenerationCall,
        ResponseCodeInterpreterToolCall,
        LocalShellCall,
        McpCall,
        McpListTools,
        McpApprovalRequest,
    ],
    PropertyInfo(discriminator="type"),
]

- ModelResponse ka "output" hmesha inhi may se koi aik hoga
- Humary case may [ResponseOutputMessage, ResponseFunctionToolCall] ye 2 hi response aa sktay hain (1. Ya to tool call krne ka bolega e.g. tool call, handoff 2. Ya phir final_output aajyega)

@dataclass
class SingleStepResult:
    original_input: str | list[TResponseInputItem]
    model_response: ModelResponse    
    """The model response for the current step."""

    pre_step_items: list[RunItem]
    new_step_items: list[RunItem]
    next_step: NextStepHandoff | NextStepFinalOutput | NextStepRunAgain
    """The next step to take."""

- SingleStepResult may humay 5 cheezain milti hain model_response may humay is step ka result milta hai
